full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS MDZAD PA RTA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RTA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHO GA 'DI NI YUL MI RNAMS RTA'I GA-YANG SHIN TU NYAMS NAS NYAMS MA THAG PA LA BYAMS PA'I SEMS CAN KUN NAS BLANGS TE THA SHAL SMYON PA'I SPYOD YUL NA SU RI KARMA MING CAN GYIS ^SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS LA GZHI BYAS NAS 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL BYUNG BA LA MKHAS PA RNAMS LA BSHAGS PA'O, BDAG LA SGRIB PA MI 'BYUNG BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DGE BA'I 'GRO KUN DBUL BA'I SDUG BSNGAL BRAL BAR GYUR CIG ,MYUR DU DAG PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU SKYE BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,)
